name: Finding truth
description:
This game is only for our homework at university not so good and not so playable XD, this game is still prototype there will be so many bug anywhere... 
Kelompok : - Muhammad Romy Maysan (Program /Asset)

Character asset from GUMDROP
When in Top Down Mode :
Move: WASD
Shoot: Mouse Left Click
When in pathfinding / dragdrop :
Use mouse hold left click to move the object
